§ 300319. Tribal land In this division, the term “tribal land” means—(1) all land within the exterior boundaries of any Indian reservation; and
(2) all dependent Indian communities.
(Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3191.)
